title: Designing the Hebrides
overview: From a family-owned fish shop in Tobermory, a bothy on the remote island of Ulva to a bookshop and caf√© on Skye, Banjo and the team rise to the Hebridean make-over challenge.Each week, Banjo and his design team embrace a unique interior design project, fulfilling the client's brief on a limited budget and a fast turnaround. Set against stunning Scottish landscapes and amidst the challenges of hard-to-reach locations and extreme conditions, Designing the Hebrides showcases distinctive makeovers, encapsulating Banjo's irrepressible enthusiasm, ingenuity and design flair.
